mapper.insert: insert into public_tenant(id, tenant_id, tenant_name, tenant_logo, location, contact, address, qualification, remark, status, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time, is_del) values (#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{tenantName}, #{tenantLogo}, #{location}, #{contact}, #{address}, #{qualification}, #{remark}, #{status}, #{create_user}, #{update_user}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{is_del})
mapper.select:
select * from public_tenant
and tenant_name like concat('%', #{tenantName}, '%')
and contact like concat('%', #{contact}, '%')
and status = #{status}
and is_del = 0
order by create_time desc
